@rkeithhill Thanks for great feedback!

I think we should be more conservative - other developers might have their preferences and we shouldn't overwrite them.

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Keep in mind that the use of a "workspace" specific settings file only overrides "user" specific settings for that workspace.  And that is typically what you want.  That is, a user might prefer tabs to spaces but this project uses spaces.  So adding that setting to an editor config file will ensure that spaces are used for this user in only this workspace.  In his own projects, tabs will still be used.
